Text:
Classification: Reality
Genre: Family
Status: New Series
Network: tv-on ( New Zealand )
Premiere: August 22, 2012

Keep Calm and Carry On is a compass through the quagmire of the many decisions parents have to make. And while looking into modern research telling us how to set our kids up for the best shot in life, Jaquie also looks at the old-school ways of childrearing. What have we ditched that quite frankly makes good sense?  

(http://www.tvnz2012.co.nz/detail.php?id=88)
